item.description:
Help prepare for the Republican National Convention in September by supporting these and other grassroots Ron Paul projects with your generous contribution.

With many primaries and delegate caucuses to go before the convention on September 1 we plan to use the full range of media strategies - tv, radio, direct mail and auto-phone calls - to contact as many voters as possible in both Massachusetts and other states.

Our success in raising over $49,000 to place a full-page Ron Paul ad in the Boston Globe on Feb. 4. demonstrates the strong support for our campaign projects.


Our immediate goal in the two weeks before March 4 is to target the 700,000 Ohio voters who voted in the last presidential primary (2004). The most efficient way to reach them is through automated calling with a strong message on why Ron Paul is the better candidate. Please donate TODAY to this effort!


A direct mail campaign, targeting 200,000 voters on the March 4th primary (Ohio, 88 delegates; RI, 20 delegates; Texas, 140 delegates; and Vermont, 17 delegates) will cost approximately $50,000. These funds will also support ongoing outreach radio and ad efforts in those states.

A second target date for us is April 5 when with your help we will capture 22 uncommitted Massachusetts delegates at the caucuses for Ron Paul in this state. We will target Republican supporters with newspaper ads and phone calls at an estimated cost of $25,000.

All Meetup events are independent efforts and not a part of the official campaign or any associated PAC and so the FEC limit of $2300 does not apply.

Help fund these and other important outreach projects to promote Ron Paul by credit card now. With your help he will win the nomination!
item.name: Onto the National Convention in September!
